评论详情: I love this because the material is stretchy  and comfy, and the skirt is long enough that I can wear it on an errand yet short enough that I can wear it to yoga. I also love that it’s athletic yet feminine. I am 5’8” and slender. I always buy leggings a size up just because I like them to be a little bit loose and comfy. I would take a small but I like the extra room in the medium. It definitely fits true or even generous; I’d have been comfortable in the small. I have another brand of skirted legging that is binding and so short skirted that I could only wear it to yoga and not on the street (if being modest). This brand is much better inmho, but it won’t provide a firm Spanx effect if that’s what you’re looking for.

评论概述: So soft and the skirt over my butt is the best.
评论详情: I get asked about these all the time. I use these for beach volleyball. They are comfortable and cute!

I’m very happy with these leggings! Super soft, fit great... the only surprise (which is not All that bad) is the fabric is kinda see through. Luckily the leggings have a skirt to give double coverage! And on a second note, I would not consider these “active wear” for the same reason, thin material.
This legging/skort is soft and made of good quality material. It’s very flattering and comfortable. Feels like I’m encased in butter!! LOVE IT!

I bought two, blue and black. I would suggest you stick to the black because the seam in the interior layer is quite visible. It's comfortable but thin. I also bought small and medium and the medium was a little large. These appear to be a dupe of the Marcella NYC  version that I like a whole lot better. These are not going to last.
NOT impressed. The skirt was way too tight for the leggings. They were also very thin and shiny.  Do NOT recommend

These are the most comfortable leggings ever, and they feel so soft. I can't wait to buy more in different colors.  I have a hard time with leggings that cut into me at the waist and these are really different. The skirt part is just like a really long yoga waist, so they aren't tight at all. But they don't fall down either. There's no seam or elastic at the top, just very stretchy material.  EDIT: The fabric is very susceptible to snagging or pulling, like a pair of nylons. I've got a big pull that goes all the way across one thigh after wearing for a few hours. BUT still super comfy !

评论概述: Ii did not like the material
评论详情: The idea of a miniskirt legging is cute but the material is not flattering for my body thickness. not sure what material this is but its not your typical cotton legging like the ones you get at H&M or Target (Cotton?).  It very soft but very thin and loose and long  at the ankles. For reference, I  Ordered XL im usually a sz 10/12 or Large 5'5'' about 187lbs
These leggings are cute and comfortable but I wouldn’t feel right wearing out of the house due to how thin the fabric is. You can see through it. Also these would be best for warmer months.

评论概述: Really cute! Some important notes in the comments
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised with these. I have tried them on, but not had an opportunity to wear them out. A few things to know when ordering these: They are more lightly ruched than the pictures show. So, you will get more of a miniskirt look, which I prefer. They are not foldover. That is evident from the picture, but the name is misleading. They are very soft. I really look forward to wearing them. Do note that they are hand wash. That's not a problem for me, since I hand wash a fair portion of my clothing. But if you need a wash-and-go item, this would not be it.  Overall, I'm very pleased, and hope to wear these a great deal.

I was concerned about the quality after reading the reviews on these leggings, but I ordered anyways. Glad I did b/c I love these. They are SO soft and very comfortable. They do feel like pajama leggings, as other reviews have mentioned, but I've worn them out and to yoga/pilates classes. I have worn them over a dozen times, hand washed them twice, and so far so good. A couple issues - the black die rubs off of these. I wore them to bed one night and my sheets were discolored afterwards. Beware of that. Also, there is some pilling in the inner thigh area, but you know, my thighs rub together, so I get that :).
I love to wear this.  It's extreme comfortable and stylish.
Espantosa la tela
I think these are basically leggings with a very thin, short skirt over top. I would not wear these in public, personally, but I do like them for in door lounging.

I like the softness but the downside is there is not much support. Someone else mentioned the skirt is not as ruched as the photo implies. I agree; the skirt is generously cut so fits rather smooth/tight, however it does seem to stay put. I live in Central Texas so I know I'll be wearing these when temperatures FINALLY drop below 80 degrees; they're pretty warm. I bought a Large; I'm 5'6 and weigh 164lbs.

评论概述: Very soft, order several sizes up.
评论详情: These leggings are really soft and extremely comfortable. I did order several sizes up as previous reviewers suggested. I am 5’4” 135 lbs and normally wear a size 8. I ordered an XL and they fit beautifully though a Large would have worked just as well. The material is of good quality and is not see-through. I will be purchasing more.

评论概述: Cute but can’t get the smell out
评论详情: I like them on and the fit but can’t get the smell out. I’ve tried vinegar soak and wash, borax soak and wash….nothing works. I’m going to have to throw them out! Very disappointed
These are terrible quality.  Thin. Cheap.  I'm not even gonna bother ever putting them on. It looks like something ordered off Shein.

I loved these, their feel is amazing and the style is so cute. I did not feel they were "loose" like other suggested. They are stretchy, but I ordered a large and felt that was fine for me (normally wear a medium/large). The "forest green" color is . kind of a deep teal, I love it.  However, they tore on my first wear!! so bummed that now I'll have to replace return or repair them. It seemed like a stretch tear of some sort rather than a snag, the fabric basically just split open. :(
The garment fits fine on my 5’ 3” frame. Not too sheer, but the material is very soft and lightweight. I dislike how the material seems to “stretch” unflatteringly at my ankles.
Wasn't anywhere near the color pictured and the skirt part is kind of weird when it's on. Disappointed.

These aren’t super cheap, but worth it. The material is thin, so they may not last too long. Keep in mind the grey ones are rather light grey, not the antracit black I was expecting. See picture how they look under a black t-shirt.

I bought previous skirt with leggings, and the skirt part would fit perfectly, but the Leggings would fit like pants.  But these are a perfect fit. The Leggings actually fit like leggings.  Only a Lil down side, that the waist is not a high waistline. But not a deal breaker. I would totally purchase again.

评论概述: Comfy like jim-jams, but they won’t stay up
评论详情: These are so soft that I don’t want to take them off, but I cannot wear them out of the house because they slip down (over my ample hips!) and I have to keep tugging them back up. I guess they need a better waistband? I bought two pair & might undertake sewing some elastic in them because they feel amazing on. Love the skinny legs & the cute little skirt.

These pants are sooooooo soft and comfortable. My only issue with them is that they clearly are very thin and I don’t see them lasting very long. But while they do they are incredibly comfortable and fit like a dream.

评论概述: Soft Fabric, Very Flattering, Fits Perfect!

I will be ordering this in other colors now
These leggings seem more like pajama pants than anything else.

评论概述: I’ve bought at least 4 pairs- love them!!!

These are amazing!  They are so soft and look great!  We aren’t supposed to wear leggings to work, but they allow these because they look nice and classy!  I have had numerous compliments by coworkers and clients!  I can’t say enough about these!  They hold up through multiple washes also!
Fits great.  Looks good. Plenty long.. the only drawback is the bottom legs are not tight. They are slightly loose around the ankles.

These are AWESOME.  They arrived fairly quickly. They are super soft with good stretch. The attached skirt has awesome ruched sides so you can scrunch it up to cover problem areas, or to adjust the length. These would be good as active pants, but I bought them to use for travel as comfy yet stylish travel clothes. Love these.
So comfortable. Different. I’m I wish there were more colors, I’d wear almost every day!

Product is super comfortable. This is great to wear as a teacher and waitress as I am both. Comfy and flattering. The crotch area does begin to get little holes after a few wears and washes but it's minimal.

I was pleasantly surprised by how soft the material is. I bought one pair and will be buying more in the future. The pair I received fit well and the skirt stays up with no issues. I bought a small and I’m 5’2” and 110 lbs.

I always loved Splended skirted leggings but they dont make them anymore These are on the cheaper side so dont feel as comfy but passable Just make sure you go a size up I'm 5 ' 8 inch 140 lbs and wear large so I returned them I may order XL

I cant say enough how skeptical i was about these leggings. But they are SOFT like i just wanna touch my legs all day and the color is cuteee. I coulda sized down but im happy with it over all. Im 5'4 and 160-170 lbs.

These are VERY stylish and so much cheaper than some of the "truck show" type ath-leisure wear that is out there. They look and feel great! Very unique in the skirt does NOT show front and behind parts of the female anatomy that are often better left covered up! I am a fan.
The fabric is Very soft & good fit
I love these!  I’ve bought two pair and will be getting more.  Super soft.  Nice and long!  Love how the skirt makes me  feel ‘tucked in’.  Keep their shape!  Great price

Very soft fabric that holds it's shape. Fits as sized. Just bought my second pair.
The material is  soft and VERY lightweight.  I was expecting the fabric to have a more substantial weight, but I will be keeping them.

I really like the cotton very nice soft and comfortable however they arrived in South Africa with a tinny hole in them which was disappointing I have had it mended. not so crazy ether about the gather of fabric on the side. I am happy with the skirted pants but would not purchase this style again also too much fabric at the leg making folds down the leg which is not attractive.

I am usually a medium but ordered a large because these items usually run small.  But even in a medium it wouldn't have had the elastic quality necessary to feel put together. Love these. I’m 5’5” 140 and the medium fits perfect

Hands down the best legging purchase ive made in forever. True to size! Silky smooth and breathable. They are just what i needed for work as a cocktail waitress. Im literally ordering 2 more pairs now!!!
Soft very thin fabric,.. comfortable but I hot a hole the first time laundered. Frustrating.
Love these so much!! They are so comfy and the size is perfect. Will be ordering another pair.

You get what you pay for. Thought I’d take a chance. They are very soft, but as mentioned in previous comments, they are about the equivalent of making a pair of leggings out of “puffs plus tissues.” Also ordered dark grey and they are definitely navy. New pair of sleep pants I guess...
Got em for the girl friend and she loves em and they make dat a$$ look great
I love these! Sooooo soft and great quality! Wish they had my size in the charcoal color!

Disappointed in the material. It feels more like a T-shirt, thin and doesn’t have much structure, as other leggings that I own. It could be thicker and have more spandex. I would not order another pair of these .
soooo soft. great fit! Perfect for mid length tops/sweaters

love these

I want to love these, but they’re really cheap. Thin, weird pajama material, legs way too long. The skirt part and waistband are good, but the whole thing overeall didn’t work for me
Too sheer and fitted

Gosh, I really don’t understand all of the awful reviews. I have these in 2 colors (teal and wine) and I’m about to buy more. I live in them. They are soft, comfortable, skirted (and it’s ruched, which is a nice touch), and flattering, at least on my curvy body type. They are opaque and not see-through—at least the teal and wine colors. They are not compression. If that’s what you’re looking for, these are not the ones for you. But neither do they hang off you, like some reviews have said, at least if you buy the right size. Maybe those folks needed to size down. But I’m happy & comfortable with my usual size and will keep buying more of them. My only complaint? Some of the colors and patterns that used to be available aren’t anymore, and I want them! :)

I usually buy $80 leggings - but I really wanted a few with skirts- and no one has them right now- everyone has joggers instead. The last time I bought joggers, I ended up saving them (I needed new gym clothes)- for a few years and then I gave them away. They were so unflattering.  These are lovely! I can't believe they were so inexpensive! They're flattering in spite of the pandemic 20 I put on (and I'm having trouble breaking all of the habits that helped put them on).  I noticed that some customers said these are hand wash only. I usually run hand wash items in the wash on delicate with woolite- so I'll try that and see if they survive.  I just lost some very expensive layering shirts to holes earlier than expected- so it's not all price- sometimes it's just cheap fabrics and cautious washing. I'll see how they survive.

I'm 5'4", 130 lb. purchased the small. Perfect close to skin fit (which is what I wanted). Shorter skirt than pictured if you wear it ruched (which I do). Lets are long, but easy to fold into a capri length cuff. Very soft, thin - great for summer. I immediately ordered  second pair and will get a third when black is back in stock.

Super soft, super stretchy, and great adjustability with being able to make the skirt portion higher or lower on the waist, shorter/longer on the thigh, more or less ruched, etc. I mostly exercise in them, and also run quick errands. I started with black & navy, and am coming back for gray. I’m 5’4”, 140 lbs, between size 6-8, and the small is snug but comfy. Medium would probably work as well.

I've been looking for the perfect pair of skirted leggings.. THESE ARE IT. Softer than you can imagine, so comfortable!! The skirt is kind of short but stretchy, so I find I pull it down every so often. I"m 5'8 160lbs (I've got strong, powerful legs) and the LARGE Was perfect for my figure.. so sexy. I'm ordering every color. :)

These actually fit and look nice on.  However, the XL is  just a bit tighter than I would prefer, especially in the back.  Generally, XL is appropriate for my sizing, but for things coming from Asia, usually need a 2XL.  Otherwise, love the softness...exactly what I was looking for.  I would love to lose 10 pounds, but not counting on it.  So took off 1 star for the sizing.  As always, pockets in the skirt would be awesome as well.
I want to buy in every color!
Comfortable and soft.

I disliked how thin the material is. They have the texture of underwear, with no compression properties. The quality of the craftsmanship is very poor. I would not order these again, and I will have to find another manufacturer for this style
